description: Discover the best hotels in Jabiru, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Unforgettable Kakadu Crocodile Hotel Stay in National Park with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover the spirit of Australia at the iconic Mercure Kakadu Crocodile Hotel. This crocodile-shaped property is set in the township of Jabiru within the Kakadu National Park - under three hour's drive from Darwin - making it the perfect base to connect with the oldest living culture on earth At this outback oasis, plunge into the glistening outdoor pool, or feast on some gourmet bush tucker at the Manjmukmuk Restaurant. Art enthusiasts can admire the hotel's collection of Indigenous art at the onsite gallery or hop over to the nearby Bowali Visitors Centre to deepen your cultural immersion.

seo.title: Hotels in Jabiru - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
